amendment.description: Amendment repeals section 451 of the Foreign Assistance Act which allows the President to spend up to $25 million per year on unanticipated emergencies; and reduces to $35 million the amount that may be expended under section 614 of the Foreign Assistance Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 and printed in House Report 105-725 to delete the contingency funding authority in section 451 of the Foreign Assistance Act and reduce by $15 million the authority of section 614 of the Foreign Assistance Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Livingston amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
